og_description: 'WhereIsWebb' shows the status of Webb on its journey to L2 orbit. The page constantly updates as Webb travels, deploys, and cools to operating temperature. Note that the timing, duration and/or order of deployment phases and steps may change. This page shows the default/nominal timing and order.
